Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Charles W Riley
Reviews.Content: Absolute garbage.  I can't believe I wasted money on this.  10 more words are required for me to post this.

Reviews.Title: In sc
Reviews.Author: T. Hankins "austinshopper"
Reviews.Content: I think I expected a better product. I gave it to my grandson as a toy. The picture quality was bad.

Reviews.Title: Buy another product
Reviews.Author: Liu Evers
Reviews.Content: This is the worst pen camera ever. Don't waste you time or money on this junk. If you want a better deal shop at Walmart for a similar product for less money. I made the mistake of thinking that these features would provide exceptional quality but I couldn't give it to my grandson as a gift because the product didn't work. Even the refills were not included. Don't waste your money.  Junk! Junk! Junk!

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Randall Hampton
Reviews.Content: The product did not work when I received it.  I called the manufacturer and was told the product was defective and they no longer sold it.  I was told my only recourse was to return it to the seller and the seller had been told the product was defective. A total disappointment!

Reviews.Title: Not working
Reviews.Author: George Adams Ofosu
Reviews.Content: This pen DVR is cute but unfortunately it does not function, it can not record videos even when instruction was well followed. It only functions as a storage device.

Reviews.Title: There is NO audio!!!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Fisher
Reviews.Content: Be warned, I looked at several products before ordering this one and I did not notice at all on the product description that this does not have audio recording with video!! That really defeats its purpose as far as I'm concerned. Video looks good, but I will most likely return it! It is not what I expected and not what I need without audio recording on videos!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered as advertised and functions well.  The photographs and videos are of great quality and the product is practical for my purposes.  I use it to capture evidence to be used in a variety of proceedings.  The stealth quality is on the high end and parallels that of some more expense brands.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 8GB memory
Hi res video recording built into a covert pen
Store up to 8 hours of video; Store up to up to 250, 000 photos
Easily connects to your PC or MAC with USB for quick viewing
3 ink refills to prolong use
ProductInfo.Name: Svat PI101 Covert Pen DVR with Built-In Color Camera and 8 GB Flash Drive
